name: Golden Rush - Witch Hero
detailed_description:
Unlocking the Witch hero.

Alira, the villain witch. The Order of Sorceresses harbored in the deserts of El Fior had always kept its secrets well hidden. Seductive, beautiful and immortal witches had amassed great powers over the centuries. They lived in pyramids in forgotten sand valleys, unseen by any travellers. Having lost their trust in men, they would kidnap only girls from local villages, choosing those who had a magical gift. The little girls were taught sorcery. Year after year, local women would find crystal balls in empty cradles. One could see the faces of kidnapped babies in cold glass.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Celeron E3200 / Athlon X2 6550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 6800 / ATI X1800 / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Celeron E3200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel Celeron E3200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 6800 / ATI X1800 / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
